discourse_list.title: New year and why you should stay optimistic

content.content: Happy New Year, This is a charge to let you know that things will pick up in this new year,I always prefer to stay Optimistic always. The optimism Ecosystem has paved way for us all to learn and earn,also be a part of the community, how to start is very important, there is a review tutorials to learn about different apps on Optimism.After each tutorial, complete a quest testing what you’ve learned.when all this is done you earn by Minting a badge for every quest you complete to commemorate your exploration.This is how to stay informed on what is happening with the ecosystem. START YOUR JOURNEY WITH A BANG; link:Optimism Gateway Please note these are independent service providers that Optimism is linking to for your convenience - Optimism has no responsibility for their operation. Start your Journey for a good year ahead and have the best year while you stay Optimistic!!!
I totally agree with you it really easy to get unborad new users to optimism ecosystem through the Optimism quest it better we all stay safe and be optimistic  _
@Sheikhrahyan Thank you acknowledging, it will be a great year.Cheers
Better believe it   we always stay optimistic
You should stay optimistic, because there is no other way around it. Positive energy attracts positive things in life
I agree to this too thanks buddy.
Great year i hopebto all cummunity optimism
